title: Rain-X 800002242 & AF21106D Glass Treatment and Anti-Fog Combo
feature: This combo includes 1 bottle Rain-X Original Glass Treatment and 1 bottle Rain-X Anti Fog to protect your exterior and interior sides of glass and mirrors.
Improve all-weather visibility, safety and driving comfort for exterior and interior windows.
Rain-X Original Glass treatment for exterior glass repels rain, sleet and snow
Rain-X Anti Fog prevents fogging of interior glass and mirrors
description: This combo includes Rain-X Original Glass Treatment and Rain-X Anti Fog. Improve all-weather visibility, safety and driving comfort for exterior and interior windows. Rain-X Original Glass treatment for exterior glass repels rain, sleet and snow. Rain-X Anti Fog prevents fogging of interior glass and mirrors.
